title: Application Lifecycle Management
description: Learn how to deploy, update, rollback, configure, scale and self-heal an application.

courses.title: Deployments, Rolling Updates and Rollbacks
courses.description: Understand deployments and how to perform rolling update and rollbacks.

courses.title: Application Configurations
courses.description: Know various ways to configure applications.

courses.title: Self-Healing Application
courses.description: Understand the primitives necessary to create a self-healing application.
